Please pardon the commercial posting, duplicate posting, and if you have
seen this on the Nihonto Message Board already.

I started a 50% off sale on all books on my website except consignment books
(those with CONSIGNED in the description) on the NMB a few days ago, and
wanted to extend it to all on all the lists.
The sale will continue for at least a few more days, and I will announce the
end of the sale with about 24 hours notice.

I will reduce the prices on consigned books as much as I can but most of
them have nominal markups.

Shipping at cost.

All other terms per my website. All orders are processed by me and totals
including shipping confirmed before your credit card (or PayPal) is charged
- nothing is automatic about the back end of my website.

Thanks for looking,

Craig

-- 
Craig Harris
Bridge of Dreams, LLC
Books from and about Asia
www.bridgeofdreams.com
Member, IOBA, Independent Online Booksellers Association
Member, MWABA, Midwest Antiquarian Booksellers Association
